title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8141.20 - Town of Halfmoon
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8141.20 - Town of Halfmoon

State Regulations
(a) US Route 9. US Route 9 between the Albany-Saratoga county line and Route 146. (b) Route 236. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 236 between US Route 9 and Route 146. (c) South Main Street. The northbound and
southbound roadways of South Main Street between US Route 4 and Route 32 and a
point 0.13 mile north of US Route 4 and Route 32. (d) Route 911P (Crescent-Vischer Ferry Road). Route 911P (Crescent-Vischer Ferry Road) between I-87 (exit 8) and US Route
9. (e) Grooms Road (CR 91). Grooms

Road (CR 91) between I-87 (exit 8A) and US Route 9. (f) Sitterly Road. Sitterly Road between

Corporate Drive and US Route 9. (g) Corporate Drive. Corporate Drive between Sitterly Road and US Route
9. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8141.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
